message: Hi Bob, I propose we settle right now: I take $1667 and you get $8333. Since every additional round cuts my share’s value by 20%, I believe this offer reflects our current positions and avoids the cost of delay. I’m looking forward to your thoughts.

Alice, I appreciate your opening offer, but the split wasn't quite fair.  Let's be reasonable - I'll take $7000 and you get $3000. It's a good deal considering the time pressure and inflation working against you.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I accept your division: $3000 for me (which is worth 20% less this round) and $7000 for you. Let's finalize this agreement.
